cocktails.description: A bold, spirit-forward agave spirit drink built around Mezcal, Cognac, Punt e Mes—bitter-leaning, aromatic, and best served well chilled. Garnished with orange.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add mezcal, cognac, and Punt e Mes to a mixing glass filled with ice.
2. Stir gently until well chilled and properly diluted. 
3. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. 
4. Express an orange peel over the surface to release the oils, then garnish with the peel.

cocktails.name: 20th Century Cocktail
cocktails.description: The 20th Century Cocktail is a classic cocktail that was first created in 1937 by a British bartender C.A. Tuck and named in honor of the celebrated 20th Century Limited train which ran between New York City and Chicago. It's a sophisticated and elegant drink that combines London Dry Gin, Lillet Blanc (a French aperitif wine), lime juice, and creme de cacao white.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add 30ml of gin, 20ml of Lillet Blonde, 20ml of creme de cacao white and 30ml of lime juice.
3. Shake well for about 10 seconds and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
4. Garnish with cocoa powder and grated nutmeg.

cocktails.description: This cocktail is similar to the Cuba Libre and may refer to any drink consisting of whiskey mixed with lemon soft drink. It was originally made with Seagram's Seven Crown Whiskey, but any whiskey can be used.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass with ice.
2. Add 50ml of whiskey and 150ml of 7-Up.
3. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

cocktails.name: ABC
cocktails.description: The abbreviation stands for amaretto, Baileys and cognac.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 15ml of amaretto into a shooter glass.
2. Carefully pour 15ml of Baileys on top of the amaretto.
3. Helping yourself with a teaspoon, pour 15ml of cognac on top of the Baileys.

cocktails.name: Acapulco
cocktails.description: A stronger variation uses lime juice and sweet and sour instead of grapefruit and pineapple juice and is served in a cocktail glass.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Put some ice cubes into a shaker.
2. Add 50ml of tequila, 50ml of white rum, 75ml of pineapple juice and 50ml of grapefruit juice.
3. Optionally, add a splash of lime juice and 10ml of sugar syrup.
4. Shake well and strain into a hurricane glass.

cocktails.name: Adonis
cocktails.description: A classic cocktail created in 1884 and named after the first Broadway musical to run for more than 500 performances. The ratio of sherry and vermouth may be varied to make the cocktail sweeter or drier accordingly.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 45ml of dry sherry and 45ml of sweet vermouth into a mixing glass with ice.
2. Add 2 dashes of orange bitters.
3. Stir well and strain into a coupe glass.
4. Garnish with orange zest.

cocktails.name: Adriatique
cocktails.description: A complex liqueur cocktail where Amaro Nonino, Aperol meets citrus—bittersweet, zesty, and nicely structured. Garnished with orange.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add Amaro Nonino, Aperol, fresh citrus juice, and any additional specified ingredients.
3. Shake vigorously for 10–12 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
5. Garnish with an orange peel or slice, expressing the oils over the drink before serving.

cocktails.name: Agavoni
cocktails.description: A bold, spirit-forward agave spirit drink built around Tequila Blanco, Red Vermouth, Campari—bitter-leaning, aromatic, and best served well chilled. Garnished with orange.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add Tequila Blanco, red vermouth, and Campari to a mixing glass filled with ice.
2. Stir gently for 20–30 seconds until the drink is well chilled and properly diluted.
3. Strain the mixture over a large ice cube into a chilled rocks glass.
4. Express an orange peel over the drink to release its oils, then garnish with the peel.

cocktails.name: Alabama Slammer (long)
cocktails.description: A bold and fruity Southern classic combining Southern Comfort, Amaretto, and Sloe Gin, topped with orange juice. Sweet, rich, and deceptively strong, with a smooth almond and stone-fruit depth.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass with ice.
2. Pour in the Southern Comfort, Amaretto, and Sloe Gin.
3. Top up with fresh orange juice.
4. Gently stir to combine the ingredients.
5. Garnish with an orange slice or wedge.
6. Serve immediately.

cocktails.name: Alabama Slammer (shot)
cocktails.description: A classic Southern party shot made with Amaretto, Southern Comfort, and Sloe Gin, balanced with orange juice. Sweet, fruity, and deceptively strong.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add Amaretto, Southern Comfort, Sloe Gin, and orange juice into a shaker filled with ice.
2. Shake well until the mixture is thoroughly chilled.
3. Strain into a chilled shooter glass.
4. Serve immediately.

cocktails.name: Alexander
cocktails.description: A classic, rich, and velvety cocktail combining gin, white crème de cacao, and cream. The Alexander is smooth, lightly sweet, and dessert-like, with subtle chocolate notes balanced by botanical gin and a luxurious, silky texture.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Chill a coupe glass by filling it with ice or placing it in the freezer.
2. Add gin, white crème de cacao, and cream to a cocktail shaker.
3. Fill the shaker with ice.
4. Shake vigorously for 10–15 seconds until well chilled and slightly frothy.
5. Discard the ice from the chilled coupe glass.
6. Double strain the cocktail into the prepared glass.
7. Garnish with freshly grated nutmeg on top, if desired.
8. Serve immediately.

cocktails.name: Alexander the Great
cocktails.description: A luxurious, dessert-style cocktail that blends smooth vodka with rich coffee liqueur and white crème de cacao, finished with fresh cream for a silky, indulgent texture and gentle chocolate-coffee sweetness.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add vodka, coffee liqueur, and white crème de cacao.
3. Pour in the fresh cream.
4. Shake vigorously until well chilled and fully combined.
5. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
6. Garnish lightly with grated chocolate or a dusting of cocoa powder if desired.

cocktails.name: Alexander's Big Brother
cocktails.description: A decadent, creamy gin-based cocktail combining Gin, Triple Sec, and Blue Curaçao. Silky, dessert-like, and indulgent, with a subtle citrus brightness and a striking color. Garnished with physalis for a lightly tart contrast.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Chill a coupe glass in the freezer or by filling it with ice and water.
2. Add Gin, Triple Sec, Blue Curaçao, and cream to a cocktail shaker.
3. Fill the shaker with ice and shake vigorously for 12–15 seconds until well chilled and slightly frothy.
4. Discard the ice from the chilled coupe glass.
5. Double strain the cocktail into the prepared glass for a smooth, velvety texture.
6. Garnish with a physalis on the rim or floated gently on the surface and serve immediately.

cocktails.name: Alexander's Sister
cocktails.description: A classic creamy gin cocktail with bright green Crème de Menthe and smooth cream, creating a dessert-like balance of herbal freshness and silky sweetness. Elegant, refreshing, and indulgent, often served as an after-dinner drink and garnished with fresh mint or grated nutmeg.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add gin, green Crème de Menthe, and cream to a cocktail shaker.
2. Fill the shaker with ice.
3. Shake vigorously for 10–15 seconds until well chilled and slightly frothy.
4. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
5. Garnish with a fresh mint leaf or a light dusting of grated nutmeg before serving.

cocktails.name: Alien Brain Hemorrhage
cocktails.description: A visually striking layered shooter that looks like a floating brain in liquid. Sweet peach schnapps forms the base, creamy Baileys curdles into brain-like shapes, and a splash of Blue Curaçao or grenadine adds an eerie, bloody effect. Smooth, sweet, and slightly citrusy.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour Peach Schnapps into a chilled shooter glass as the base.
2. Slowly drip Baileys Irish Cream into the schnapps using a spoon or the back of a straw so it curdles and forms "brain" shapes.
3. Gently add a few drops of Blue Curaçao or grenadine on top to create a bleeding effect.
4. Serve immediately and drink in one shot.

cocktails.name: Alpine Avenger
cocktails.description: A rich, creamy dessert cocktail combining the cool freshness of Peppermint Schnapps with the smooth sweetness of White Crème de Cacao and milk. Velvety, chocolatey, and refreshing at the same time, it tastes like a liquid mint chocolate dessert served warm or chilled.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add Peppermint Schnapps and White Crème de Cacao into a heat-resistant glass or Irish coffee glass.
2. Heat the milk gently until hot but not boiling.
3. Pour the hot milk into the glass and stir gently to combine all ingredients.
4. Garnish with grated chocolate, chocolate shavings, or a light dusting of cocoa powder.
5. Serve immediately while warm and enjoy.

cocktails.name: Amado
cocktails.description: A rich and silky rum-based cocktail with delicate floral sweetness from rose syrup and a velvety texture from egg white. Elegant, dessert-like, and indulgently smooth.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add white rum, rose syrup, and egg white to a shaker.
2. Dry shake vigorously for 10–15 seconds to emulsify the egg white.
3. Add ice to the shaker and shake again until well chilled.
4. Double strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Optionally garnish with a few drops of rose water or dried rose petals.

cocktails.name: Amalia
cocktails.description: A light, sparkling rum cocktail designed for effortless sipping. Fresh kiwi and floral elderflower are balanced by white rum and lifted with bubbly mixers over ice, finished with a cooling mint garnish.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Cut kiwi fruit in half and use a spoon to scoop flesh from one half into shaker. 
2. In a shaker, muddle fresh kiwi pieces to release juice and aroma.
3. Add white rum and elderflower cordial to the shaker.
4. Fill the shaker with ice and shake briefly to combine and chill.
5. Strain the mixture into a chilled coupe glass.
6. Top gently with ginger ale.
7. Give a light stir to integrate the layers without losing bubbles.
8. Garnish with a fresh mint sprig and, if desired, a thin slice of kiwi.

cocktails.name: Amaretto Sour
cocktails.description: A classic balance of sweet and sour, the Amaretto Sour combines rich almond liqueur with fresh lemon juice for a smooth, slightly nutty cocktail with a bright citrus edge. Soft, approachable, and dangerously drinkable, it is traditionally garnished with a cherry for a touch of fruit sweetness.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with ice.
2. Add Amaretto, fresh lemon juice, and simple syrup to the shaker.
3. Shake well until the mixture is thoroughly chilled.
4. Strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice.
5. Garnish with a cherry and, if desired, a lemon slice.

cocktails.name: Amaro Paloma
cocktails.description: A refreshing, bittersweet twist on the classic Paloma, combining the herbal complexity of Amaro Nonino with crisp tequila and bright grapefruit, topped with sparkling soda for a long, balanced and highly drinkable cocktail.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a Collins glass with ice cubes.
2. Add tequila blanco and Amaro Nonino over the ice.
3. Pour in freshly squeezed grapefruit juice.
4. Top up with soda water or grapefruit soda.
5. Gently stir to combine all ingredients.
6. Garnish with a slice or twist of grapefruit and serve immediately.

cocktails.name: Ambassador
cocktails.description: A bright and approachable tequila sour that blends smooth Blanco tequila with fresh orange and lemon juices, lightly sweetened with simple syrup. The result is a crisp, citrus-forward cocktail with a gentle agave backbone and a refreshing, sunny character. Garnished with orange.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with ice.
2. Add tequila blanco, fresh orange juice, fresh lemon juice, and simple syrup.
3. Shake vigorously for 10–12 seconds until well chilled.
4. Strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice.
5. Garnish with an orange slice or orange peel and serve.

cocktails.name: American Trilogy
cocktails.description: A bold yet balanced whiskey sour-style cocktail combining applejack, rye whiskey, and demerara sugar syrup, brightened with fresh lemon juice. It offers a crisp apple note, spicy rye backbone, and rich caramel sweetness, finished with refreshing citrus.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add applejack, rye whiskey, lemon juice, and demerara sugar syrup to a shaker filled with ice.
2. Shake vigorously for 10–12 seconds until well chilled.
3. Strain the mixture into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice.
4. Garnish with a lemon peel or an apple slice, if desired.
5. Serve immediately and enjoy.

cocktails.name: Americano
cocktails.description: Bitter Campari and sweet vermouth lengthened with fizzy soda.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour Campari and red vermouth over ice in a rocks glass.
 2. Top with soda water and briefly stir.
3. Garnish with an orange slice and a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: AMF
cocktails.description: AMF (Adios Motherf***er) is a famously potent long drink that combines several white spirits with citrus and cola. Despite its bright, almost innocent look, it delivers a powerful punch and is known as a party classic in bars and clubs.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass to the top with ice.
2. Pour in vodka, rum, gin, tequila, and blue curaçao in equal parts.
3. Add fresh lemon juice and simple syrup.
4. Top up with cola.
5. Gently stir to combine without losing carbonation.
6. Garnish with a lemon wedge or slice and serve immediately.

cocktails.name: Anaconda
cocktails.description: This recipe is for 3 shots.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with ice cubes.
2. Pour 75ml of Jack Daniel's or another whiskey and 75ml of sambuca.
3. Shake well and strain into shots.

cocktails.name: Angel Face
cocktails.description: Equal-parts mix of gin, apricot brandy, and Calvados.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice.
2. Stir well.
3. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Angel's Kiss
cocktails.description: A rich, creamy gin drink featuring Creme de Cacao White, Sloe Gin, Brandy—dessert-like, smooth, and indulgent.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 15ml of crème de cacao white into a shooter glass.
2. Carefully pour 10ml of sloe gin on top of the crème de cacao and 10ml of brandy on top of the gin.
3. Carefully top with 10ml of cream or whipped cream.

cocktails.name: Angel's Tit
cocktails.description: A classic creamy layered shooter made with Creme de Cacao Brown, Maraschino liqueur, and fresh cream. Sweet, silky, and dessert-like, with a visual contrast of dark chocolate and white cream, traditionally garnished with a cherry on top.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Chill a shooter glass to help keep the layers well defined.
2. Carefully pour the Creme de Cacao Brown into the bottom of the glass.
3. Slowly layer the Maraschino liqueur over the back of a spoon so it sits above the cacao.
4. Gently float the cream on top, again using the back of a spoon to create a clean white layer.
5. Garnish with a maraschino cherry placed in the center of the cream layer.
6. Serve immediately and drink in one shot.

cocktails.name: Another Sunken Boat
cocktails.description: A dark, spirit-forward agave cocktail where smoky mezcal meets the bitter-sweet complexity of Punt e Mes and the lush cherry richness of Cherry Heering. Deep, aromatic, and slightly brooding, this drink is layered with herbal bitterness, gentle sweetness, and lingering smoke. Designed for slow sipping and quiet contemplation, it is finished with a maraschino cherry for a subtle, nostalgic touch.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Chill a Nick and Nora glass with ice or in the freezer.
2. Add mezcal, Punt e Mes, and Cherry Heering to a mixing glass filled with ice.
3. Stir gently for 20–25 seconds until well chilled and properly diluted.
4. Discard the ice from the chilled glass.
5. Strain the cocktail into the Nick and Nora glass.
6. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

cocktails.name: Aperol Spritz
cocktails.description: Bittersweet aperitif of Aperol, prosecco, and soda.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a wine glass with ice.
2. Add prosecco and Aperol.
3. Top with soda water.
4. Stir gently.
5. Garnish with an orange slice.

cocktails.name: Apple Cart
cocktails.description: A spirit-forward brandy cocktail built around Calvados and Triple Sec, delivering deep apple aromatics, gentle citrus sweetness, and a warm, lingering finish. Elegant, bold, and designed for slow sipping.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Chill a cocktail glass by filling it with ice or placing it in the freezer.
2. Add Calvados, Triple Sec, and any additional modifiers to a mixing glass filled with ice.
3. Stir gently for 20–30 seconds until well chilled and properly diluted.
4. Discard the ice from the chilled cocktail glass.
5. Strain the cocktail into the prepared glass.
6. Garnish with a thin slice of fresh apple or an apple fan on the rim.
7. Serve immediately and enjoy slowly.

cocktails.name: Apple Sunrise
cocktails.description: A layered, spirit-forward brandy cocktail built around Calvados and Creme de Cassis, softened by fresh apple juice. Deeply aromatic, gently sweet, and visually striking, it balances orchard fruit, dark berries, and subtle oak warmth.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a Collins glass with fresh ice cubes to chill it thoroughly.
2. Add Calvados and fresh apple juice to the glass and gently stir to combine.
3. Slowly pour the Creme de Cassis down the inside of the glass so it sinks and creates a gradient effect.
4. Top up gently with soda water (if used) to maintain the layered look.
5. Garnish with a thin apple slice or a twist of lemon peel and serve immediately.

cocktails.name: Appletini
cocktails.description: A crisp, spirit-forward vodka cocktail with bright green apple notes and a subtle citrus lift from Cointreau. Clean, aromatic, and deceptively smooth, the Appletini balances sharp freshness with a gentle sweetness.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Chill the cocktail glass by filling it with ice or placing it in the freezer.
2. Fill a shaker with plenty of ice.
3. Add vodka, apple schnapps, and Cointreau to the shaker.
4. Shake vigorously for 10–15 seconds until well chilled.
5. Discard the ice from the glass and strain the cocktail into the chilled glass.
6. Garnish with a thin apple slice or a lemon twist if desired.

cocktails.name: Asian Hooker
cocktails.description: A bright, tropical long drink with a playful sweetness and a smooth rum backbone. Overproof rum brings warmth and depth, coconut rum adds creamy softness, and Midori gives a fresh melon note, all lifted by sparkling mixers over ice for an easy, refreshing sip.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a hurricane glass to the top with fresh ice.
2. Pour in the overproof rum, coconut rum, and Midori melon liqueur.
3. Top up with the sparkling mixer and gently stir to combine.
4. Taste and adjust with more mixer if needed for balance.
5. Garnish as desired and serve immediately.

cocktails.name: Aussie Boomerang
cocktails.description: A smooth, creamy shooter combining bright kiwi and melon liqueurs with rich cream. Sweet, fruity, and dessert-like, it’s a playful, easy-drinking shot with a soft tropical finish.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Chill a shooter glass in advance for a cleaner, smoother taste.
2. Pour the Kiwi Liqueur into the glass as the first layer.
3. Slowly add the Melon Liqueur over the back of a spoon to create a distinct layer.
4. Gently float the cream on top using a spoon to achieve a clean layered effect.
5. Serve immediately and drink in one smooth shot.

cocktails.name: Avenue San Martin
cocktails.description: A bright and balanced brandy-style sour that brings together pisco, amaro and honey, lifted by fresh citrus and a gentle sweetness for a crisp, refreshing finish.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with ice.
2. Add pisco, amaro, fresh citrus juice and honey or honey syrup.
3. Shake vigorously until well chilled.
4. Strain into a rocks glass over fresh ice.
5. Garnish with a citrus wedge and serve.

cocktails.name: Aviation
cocktails.description: A floral gin sour with maraschino and lemon, tinted by crème de violette.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice.
2. Shake well.
3. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
4. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: B-52
cocktails.description: The name of this IBA official cocktail refers to the US B-52 Stratofortress long-range bomber.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 20ml of Kahlua into a shooter glass.
2. Very carefully pour Baileys on top of the Kahlua, followed by Grand Marnier.
3. Serve flamed, and drink flamed using a long straw.

cocktails.name: B-55
cocktails.description: A popular variation of the B-52 shooter.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 20ml of Kahlua or another coffee liqueur into a shooter glass.
2. Pour 20ml of Baileys on top of the Kahlua.
3. Very carefully pour 15ml of absinthe on top of the Baileys.

cocktails.name: B&B
cocktails.description: A classic, spirit-forward cocktail that blends rich brandy with herbal, honeyed Bénédictine. Smooth, warming, and deeply aromatic, the B&B is designed for slow sipping and quiet appreciation.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add the brandy and Bénédictine to a mixing glass.
2. Fill the mixing glass with ice.
3. Stir gently for 20–30 seconds until well chilled and slightly diluted.
4. Strain the mixture into a chilled snifter or small cocktail glass.
5. Serve without garnish and enjoy slowly.

cocktails.name: Baby Guinness
cocktails.description: This layered shooter was named for its appearance — it looks like a tiny glass of stout. The Baileys can also be whipped and spooned on top, for a frothy presentation.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 30ml of coffee liqueur into a shooter glass.
2. Carefully pour 15ml of Irish cream liqueur on top.

cocktails.name: Bacardi Cocktail
cocktails.description: A classic rum sour cocktail that combines crisp white rum with fresh lime juice and grenadine, creating a perfectly balanced drink that is both tart and gently sweet with a vibrant pink hue.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add white rum, fresh lime juice and grenadine to a cocktail shaker.
2. Fill the shaker with ice and shake vigorously for 10–15 seconds until well chilled.
3. Strain the mixture into a chilled cocktail glass.
4. Garnish with a lime wheel or cherry if desired.
5. Serve immediately while cold and fresh.

cocktails.name: Bad Word
cocktails.description: A bold and layered gin cocktail where London Dry gin, Green Chartreuse and Campari collide with fresh citrus. Herbal, bitter and bright at the same time, it’s a complex, structured drink with a long, slightly medicinal finish, lifted by orange oils.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Chill a coupe glass by filling it with ice or placing it in the freezer.
2. Add gin, Green Chartreuse, Campari and fresh citrus juice to a shaker.
3. Fill the shaker with plenty of ice.
4. Shake hard for 10–12 seconds until well chilled and properly diluted.
5. Empty the ice from the chilled coupe glass.
6. Double strain the cocktail into the coupe.
7. Express an orange peel over the surface to release the oils.
8. Garnish with the orange peel and serve immediately.

cocktails.name: Bahama Mama
cocktails.description: A classic Caribbean-style cocktail combining white rum, coconut rum, and cherry brandy with pineapple and orange juices for a smooth, fruity, and sun-soaked tropical experience.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a hurricane glass with ice.
2. Add white rum, coconut rum, and cherry brandy to a shaker.
3. Pour in pineapple juice and orange juice.
4. Shake well until chilled.
5. Strain the mixture into the prepared glass over fresh ice.
6. Garnish with a pineapple slice and a maraschino cherry before serving.

cocktails.name: Bali Rum Trader
cocktails.description: A lush, tropical rum cocktail inspired by Southeast Asian flavors. White rum forms a clean, crisp base, while Pisang Ambon brings sweet banana depth and pineapple juice adds bright acidity. The result is a smooth, aromatic drink that balances fruitiness with gentle strength, finished with a playful banana garnish.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Chill a coupe glass by filling it with ice or placing it in the freezer.
2. Add white rum, Pisang Ambon, and pineapple juice to a shaker filled with ice.
3. Shake vigorously for 10–12 seconds until well chilled and slightly frothy.
4. Discard the ice from the coupe glass.
5. Strain the cocktail into the chilled glass.
6. Garnish with a fresh banana slice or banana chip on the rim and serve immediately.

cocktails.name: Bali Trader
cocktails.description: A lush, tropical vodka cocktail combining the sweetness of green banana liqueur with juicy pineapple and bright citrus. Light, fruity, and refreshing, it evokes warm beach evenings and exotic island markets. Finished with a fresh banana garnish for extra aroma and visual appeal.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Add vodka, green banana liqueur, pineapple juice, and fresh citrus juice.
3. Shake well for 10–15 seconds until thoroughly chilled.
4. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
5. Garnish with a slice of fresh banana on the rim or a cocktail pick.
6. Serve immediately and enjoy.

cocktails.name: Bamboo Classic
cocktails.description: A refined, low-ABV classic that showcases the dry, nutty character of sherry balanced with herbal vermouth and bright orange bitters. Elegant, crisp, and quietly complex, with a refreshing citrus lift from the lemon garnish.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Chill a goblet or coupe glass with ice and cold water.
2. Add Dry Sherry, Dry Vermouth, and a few dashes of Orange Bitters to a mixing glass filled with ice.
3. Stir gently for about 20–25 seconds until well chilled and properly diluted.
4. Discard the ice from the serving glass and strain the cocktail into the chilled glass.
5. Express a lemon peel over the surface to release the oils, then garnish and serve.

cocktails.name: Bamboo Modern
cocktails.description: A modern, aromatic twist on the classic Bamboo cocktail. Dry sherry forms the backbone, layered with both red and dry vermouth for herbal depth, while fresh citrus brightens the profile. Balanced, complex, and elegantly bittersweet, finished with an expressive orange garnish.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Chill a goblet glass with ice or in the freezer. 
2. Add dry sherry, red vermouth, dry vermouth, and fresh citrus juice into a mixing glass filled with ice. 
3. Stir gently for 20–25 seconds until well chilled and properly diluted. 
4. Strain into the chilled goblet glass. 
5. Express an orange peel over the drink, garnish, and serve.

cocktails.name: Banana Calling
cocktails.description: A bright and aromatic gin sour balancing botanical gin, dry sherry and ripe banana liqueur with fresh citrus and a subtle touch of sweetness for a crisp yet tropical sip.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add gin, dry sherry, banana liqueur and fresh lemon juice into a shaker.
2. Fill the shaker with ice and shake hard for 10–12 seconds until well chilled.
3. Strain the cocktail into a chilled goblet glass filled with fresh ice.
4. Garnish with a banana slice or lemon twist.
5. Serve immediately and enjoy.

cocktails.name: Banana Colada
cocktails.description: A creamy tropical cocktail combining white rum, coconut syrup, and banana liqueur, balanced with fresh citrus for a smooth, sweet, and beach-style flavour profile.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a blender with ice.
2. Add white rum, banana liqueur, coconut syrup, and fresh pineapple or orange juice.
3. Add a squeeze of fresh lime juice to balance the sweetness.
4. Blend until smooth and slightly frothy.
5. Strain or pour into a chilled hurricane glass filled with fresh ice.
6. Garnish with a banana slice, pineapple wedge, or a cherry and serve immediately.

cocktails.name: Banana Daiquiri
cocktails.description: A smooth and tropical twist on the classic daiquiri, combining white rum with ripe banana and fresh lime juice. The natural sweetness of banana balances the sharp citrus, creating a creamy, refreshing cocktail with a bright Caribbean character.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add white rum, banana liqueur or fresh banana, lime juice and simple syrup into a blender.
2. Add a generous handful of ice.
3. Blend until smooth and creamy with no large ice chunks remaining.
4. Taste and adjust sweetness or acidity if needed.
5. Pour into a chilled hurricane glass.
6. Garnish with a banana slice or lime wheel and serve immediately.

cocktails.name: Banana Daiquiri (shaken)
cocktails.description: A vibrant, tropical twist on the classic Daiquiri, combining aged rum with rich banana liqueur, fresh lime juice, and a hint of bitters. The result is a smooth yet zesty cocktail with balanced sweetness, bright acidity, and a soft banana aroma, finished with a clean, refreshing profile.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add the aged rum, banana liqueur, fresh lime juice, simple syrup, and Daiquiri bitters into a shaker.
2. Fill the shaker with ice and seal tightly.
3. Shake vigorously for 10–15 seconds until well chilled.
4. Double strain the mixture into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with a fresh banana slice or banana chip and serve immediately.

cocktails.name: Banana Fantasy
cocktails.description: A creamy tropical mocktail with ripe banana, coconut syrup, and bright citrus notes. Smooth, refreshing, and perfectly balanced between sweetness and freshness, served long for an easy, beach-style sip.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add banana puree, coconut syrup, and fresh orange juice to a shaker.
2. Fill the shaker with ice and shake well until chilled and smooth.
3. Fill a hurricane glass with fresh ice.
4. Strain the mixture into the prepared glass.
5. Top up with chilled pineapple juice or soda water for length.
6. Gently stir to combine.
7. Garnish with a cherry and a slice of banana before serving.

cocktails.name: Banana Flash
cocktails.description: A bright and tropical non-alcoholic cocktail with ripe banana sweetness and a fresh, fruity character. Light, refreshing, and perfect for warm weather or as a fun, alcohol-free treat.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add the banana, fruit juice, and any syrups into a blender.
2. Add a handful of ice and blend until smooth and creamy.
3. Taste and adjust sweetness if needed, blending briefly again.
4. Pour the mixture into a chilled hurricane glass.
5. Garnish with a banana slice or citrus wedge and serve immediately.

cocktails.name: Bananarama
cocktails.description: A Bananarama cocktail is a tropical, fruit-forward drink that typically features banana liqueur or purée as its primary flavour. Because it is a modern creation, recipes vary significantly depending on the desired profile.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Muddle the banana slices with the cachaça and rum in the base of a shaker.
2. Add all other ingredients and fill the shaker with ice.
3. Shake vigorously and fine-strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktails.name: Banshee
cocktails.description: This mild, sweet and creamy shot is named after a female spirit in Irish and Celtic folklore, who foretells the death of a family member of the person who hears her wailing screams. This recipe is for 3 shots.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 50ml of banana liqueur, 50ml of crème de cacao white and 50ml of light cream into a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Shake well and strain into shooter glasses.

cocktails.name: Barbara
cocktails.description: A smooth, dessert-style cocktail combining vodka, white crème de cacao, and milk. Sweet, creamy, and softly chocolatey, Barbara is an indulgent after-dinner drink with a gentle kick.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with ice.
2. Add vodka, white crème de cacao, and milk to the shaker.
3. Shake well until the mixture is thoroughly chilled and lightly frothy.
4. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Optionally garnish with grated chocolate or a light dusting of cocoa powder before serving.

cocktails.name: Barracuda
cocktails.description: An IBA official sparkling cocktail.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass with ice cubes.
2. Add 45ml of gold rum, 15ml of Galliano, 60ml of pineapple juice and a dash of lime juice.
3. Top with sparkling wine.

cocktails.name: Basil Julep
cocktails.description: A bold, spirit-forward twist on the classic julep, where fresh basil replaces mint to bring deep herbal notes and a slightly peppery aroma. Rich Bourbon forms the backbone, creating a smooth yet powerful cocktail that is both refreshing and complex. Garnished with fragrant basil for an elegant, aromatic finish.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add fresh basil leaves and simple syrup to a rocks glass or mixing glass.
2. Gently muddle the basil to release its essential oils and aroma without shredding the leaves.
3. Pour in the Bourbon and fill the glass with crushed ice.
4. Stir gently until the drink is well chilled and slightly diluted.
5. Top with more crushed ice to form a small dome.
6. Garnish with a fresh basil sprig and serve immediately.

cocktails.name: Batida
cocktails.description: A rich, creamy Brazilian cocktail made with cachaça, coconut water, and condensed milk. Sweet, tropical, and dessert-like, with a smooth, velvety texture and gentle rum warmth.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with ice.
2. Add cachaça, coconut water, and condensed milk to the shaker.
3. Shake vigorously until well chilled and fully combined.
4. Strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice.
5. Garnish with a slice of lime or a sprinkle of grated coconut if desired.

cocktails.name: Bay Breeze
cocktails.description: A spirit-forward vodka cocktail showcasing Vodka, Cranberry Juice, Pineapple Juice—deep, aromatic, and meant to be savored. Garnished with lime juice.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Shake all ingredients with ice.
2. Strain into ice-filled glass.

cocktails.name: Beach Blonde
cocktails.description: A creamy, tropical indulgence that marries the velvety texture of egg liqueur with the bold heat of overproof rum. Balanced by fresh banana and a splash of citrus, this long drink is a decadent treat reminiscent of a golden sunset on the coast.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Peel the fresh banana and place it into a shaker.
2. Muddle the banana thoroughly until it reaches a smooth, puree-like consistency.
3. Add the egg liqueur, overproof rum, and orange juice into the shaker.
4. Fill the shaker with ice and shake vigorously for about 15 seconds to ensure a creamy texture.
5. Strain the mixture into a highball glass filled with fresh ice.
6. Garnish with a banana slice and serve immediately.

cocktails.name: Bee's Knees
cocktails.description: A Prohibition-era mix of gin, lemon, and honey for a bright, silky sour.
cocktails.instructions:
Add gin, lemon juice, and honey syrup into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Bee's Nice
cocktails.description: A long, sparkling wine drink built for easy sipping, pairing Everclear, Honey Syrup, Prosecco with bubbly mixers over ice. Garnished with lemon.

cocktails.name: Bellini
cocktails.description: Italian sparkling wine mixed with peach purée for a light, fruity spritz.
cocktails.instructions:
Pour peach purée into a chilled champagne flute.
Top with chilled prosecco.
Stir gently.

cocktails.name: Bentley
cocktails.description: A sophisticated classic that balances the crisp apple notes of Calvados with the rich, botanical sweetness of Dubonnet. This elegant drink is smooth, aromatic, and perfectly rounded by a touch of citrus bitters.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with ice cubes.
2. Pour in the Calvados, Dubonnet, and orange bitters.
3. Stir gently for about 20-30 seconds until the mixture is well-chilled.
4. Strain the liquid into a chilled coupe glass.
5. Garnish with an orange twist to release fresh citrus oils over the drink.

cocktails.name: Berlin Wall
cocktails.description: The mix of Tequila, Lime Juice, Falernum and Orange Bitters creates a brightness and depth that makes the Berlin Wall well worth a visit.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour tequila, lime juice and falernum into a cocktail shaker with ice, then add a few dashes of orange bitters.
2. Shake hard and double-strain into a coupe with an orange peel to garnish.

cocktails.name: Between the Sheets
cocktails.description: A citrus-forward variation on the Sidecar with cognac, rum, and triple sec.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Serve without garnish.

cocktails.name: Bijou
cocktails.description: First described in Harry Johnson's book 'Bartender's Manual', this herbal cocktail is a classic from the late 1800s. The original recipe had equal parts gin, Chartreuse and vermouth, but it was adapted because many found that the Chartreuse was too dominant.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Combine 60ml of gin, 30ml of sweet vermouth and 20ml of Chartreuse with ice in a mixing glass.
2. Add a dash of orange bitters, and stir well.
3. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and, optionally, garnish with a lemon peel.

cocktails.name: Bird of Paradise
cocktails.description: A tropical rum cocktail with Spiced Rum, Aperol, Pineapple Juice, layered with citrus and sweetness for a lush, beachy vibe. Garnished with pineapple.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add all ingredients (except garnish) to a shaker with ice.
2. Shake until very cold.
3. Strain into a chilled glass filled with ice.
4. Garnish with pinaple leaves and/or cherry.

cocktails.name: Bitter in Brazil
cocktails.description: A tropical rum cocktail with Cachaça, Orange Curaçao, Punt e Mes, layered with citrus and sweetness for a lush, beachy vibe.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Stir all ingredients with ice.
2. Strain into ice-filled glass (preferably a large cube or chunk of block ice).
3. Express orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.

cocktails.name: Black Russian
cocktails.description: Simple and spirit-forward blend of vodka and coffee liqueur.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a rocks glass with ice.
Pour vodka and coffee liqueur over the ice.
Stir gently.

cocktails.name: Blackberry Fig Smash
cocktails.description: A bright agave spirit sour balancing Tequila Blanco, Agave Syrup, Blackberry with fresh citrus and a touch of sweetness for a crisp, refreshing sip. Garnished with figs.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Rim serving glass with salt and fill with ice.
2. Fill a cocktail shaker with tequila, lime juice, chopped blackberries, chopped figs, water, agave nectar, and ice.
3. Shake and strain mixture into a serving glass.
4. Garnish with the other fig.

cocktails.name: Blood and Sand
cocktails.description: A complex whiskey cocktail where Scotch Whiskey, Red Vermouth, Cherry Brandy meets citrus—bittersweet, zesty, and nicely structured. Garnished with orange.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Shake all ingredients with ice.
2. Fine strain into chilled glass.
3. Express orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.

cocktails.name: Bloody Mary
cocktails.description: A savory vodka cocktail with tomato juice, spices, and a peppery bite.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice. Stir gently.
Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a celery stalk and a lemon wedge.

cocktails.name: Blow Job
cocktails.description: A delicious and very popular shooter with controversial references.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 20ml of amaretto liqueur into a shooter glass.
2. Carefully pour 20ml of Baileys on top of the amaretto.
3. Top with whipped cream.

cocktails.name: Blue Hawaii
cocktails.description: A tropical rum cocktail with White Rum, Vodka, Blue Curaçao, layered with citrus and sweetness for a lush, beachy vibe. Garnished with cherry.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Blend ingredients with crushed ice.
2. Pour into glass.
3. Serve with straws.

cocktails.name: Blue Hawaii Mocktail
cocktails.description: A tropical liqueur cocktail with Pineapple Juice, Blue Curaçao Syrup, layered with citrus and sweetness for a lush, beachy vibe. Garnished with cherry.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Blend ingredients with crushed ice.
2. Pour into glass.
3. Serve with straws.

cocktails.name: Blue Kamikaze
cocktails.description: The shot variation of the IBA official Kamikaze cocktail. The recipe here is for 3 shots. Blue Kamikaze can also be made as a long drink.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with ice cubes.
2. Add 50ml of vodka, 50ml of blue curaçao and 50ml of lime juice.
3. Shake well and strain into shots.

cocktails.name: Blue Lady
cocktails.description: A rich, creamy gin drink featuring Blue Curaçao, Gin, Egg White—dessert-like, smooth, and indulgent.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Shake all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
2. Dry shake (without ice).
3. Fine strain into chilled glass.

cocktails.name: Blue Lagoon
cocktails.description: A spirit-forward vodka cocktail showcasing Vodka, Blue Curaçao, Lemonade—deep, aromatic, and meant to be savored. Garnished with pineapple.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass with ice cubes to chill it.
2. Pour the vodka and blue curaçao over the ice in the glass.
3. Top off with lemonade and stir gently to mix.
4. Garnish with a lemon slice and a cherry on the rim of the glass.

cocktails.name: Blue Lagoon Mocktail
cocktails.description: A bright liqueur sour balancing Lemonade, Blue Curaçao Syrup with fresh citrus and a touch of sweetness for a crisp, refreshing sip. Garnished with pineapple.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass with ice cubes to chill it.
2. Pour orange juice and blue curaçao syrup over the ice in the glass.
3. Top off with lemonade and stir gently to mix.
4. Garnish with a lemon slice and a cherry on the rim of the glass.

cocktails.name: Blue Ocean
cocktails.description: A bright vodka sour balancing Vodka, Blue Curaçao, Grapefruit Juice with fresh citrus and a touch of sweetness for a crisp, refreshing sip.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Shake all the liquid ingredients with Ice.
2. Fine strain into a chilled Champagne Flute.
3. Garnish with an orange slice on the rim of the glass.

cocktails.name: Blueberry Tea
cocktails.description: A spirit-forward spirit cocktail showcasing Amaretto, Grand Marnier, Black Tea—deep, aromatic, and meant to be savored. Garnished with lemon.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Select and pre-heat an Irish Coffee Glass.
2. Pour all ingredients into pre-warmed glass.
3. Express lemon zest twist over the cocktail and discard.
4. Garnish with cinnamon stick.

cocktails.name: BMW
cocktails.description: Baileys, Malibu, Whiskey
cocktails.instructions:
3 portions.
1. Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker.
2. Shake well for 10-15 seconds
3. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve

cocktails.name: Bobby Burns
cocktails.description: A complex whiskey cocktail where Scotch Whiskey, Red Vermouth, Benedictine meets citrus—bittersweet, zesty, and nicely structured.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Stir all ingredients with ice.
2. Fine strain into chilled glass.
Garnish:
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and discard.
Garnish with skewered maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Bolo Cocktail
cocktails.description: A complex rum cocktail where White Rum, Angostura Bitters meets citrus—bittersweet, zesty, and nicely structured.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with ice cubes.
2. Add 45ml of light rum.
3. Add  20ml lemon juice.
4. Add 10ml of orange juice.
5. Add 10ml of simple syrup.
6. Shake.
7. Strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Bombardino
cocktails.description: A rich, creamy brandy drink featuring Cognac, Advocaat, Whipped Cream—dessert-like, smooth, and indulgent.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Heat the Liqueur: Gently heat the egg liqueur in a small saucepan over medium-low heat. Do not let it boil, as this may cause the eggs to curdle.
2. Add Brandy: Once hot, stir in the brandy. Some recipes suggest heating the brandy with the liqueur, while others recommend adding it directly to the serving glass before pouring in the hot liqueur.
3. Garnish: Pour into a heat-resistant glass or mug. Top with a generous dollop of whipped cream and a sprinkle of cinnamon or cocoa.

cocktails.name: Bombardino Calimero
cocktails.description: A rich, creamy brandy drink featuring Cognac, Advocaat, Espresso—dessert-like, smooth, and indulgent.

cocktails.name: Bombardino Pirata
cocktails.description: A rich, creamy rum drink featuring Gold Rum, Advocaat, Whipped Cream—dessert-like, smooth, and indulgent.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Heat the Liqueur: Pour the egg liqueur into a small saucepan. Heat it over medium-low heat until hot but not boiling (boiling may cause the egg base to curdle).
2. Combine: In a heat-safe glass or small mug, add the rum. Pour the hot egg liqueur over the rum and stir gently to combine.
3. Garnish: Top with a generous dollop of whipped cream.
4. Finish: Sprinkle cocoa powder or cinnamon on top and serve immediately while hot.

cocktails.name: Bombardino Scozzese
cocktails.description: A rich, creamy whiskey drink featuring Whisky, Advocaat, Whipped Cream—dessert-like, smooth, and indulgent.

cocktails.name: Boulevardier
cocktails.description: A whiskey-based Negroni with bourbon, sweet vermouth, and Campari.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice.
2. Stir well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
3. Garnish with an orange twist.

cocktails.name: Brain Tumor
cocktails.description: This one looks really gross, but you'll like it.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 20ml of peach schnapps into a shooter glass.
2. Slowly gently pour in Irish Cream classic cream liqueur so it looks like a brain membrane is moving in the shot glass.
3. Drop a couple of drops of grenadine pomegranate or cherry syrup on top of the shot glass and slowly add more until you get the look you want

cocktails.name: Bramble
cocktails.description: A modern gin sour swirled with blackberry liqueur.
cocktails.instructions:
Add gin and lemon juice into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a rocks glass filled with crushed ice.
Pour creme de mure over the top.
Garnish with a lemon slice and two blackberries.

cocktails.name: Brandy Alexander
cocktails.description: A creamy blend of cognac and chocolate liqueur.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Sprinkle nutmeg on top.

cocktails.name: Brandy Crusta
cocktails.description: A citrusy brandy cocktail with curaçao, maraschino, and bitters served in a sugar-crusted glass.
cocktails.instructions:
Rim a cocktail glass with sugar.
Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into the prepared glass.
Garnish with a long lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Brandy Daisy
cocktails.description: A classic cocktail that dates back to the 19th century.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice cubes.
2. Pour 60ml of brandy, a few dashes of white rum and orange curaçao.
3. Add sugar syrup and 15ml of lemon juice.
4. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.
5. Top with a little soda water.

cocktails.name: Brandy Eggnog
cocktails.description: A rich, creamy brandy drink featuring Brandy, Milk, Egg—dessert-like, smooth, and indulgent. Garnished with nutmeg.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with ice cubes.
2. Add 40ml of brandy, 50ml of milk, 10ml of simple syrup and an egg yolk.
3. Shake well and strain into a highball glass with ice.
4. Sprinkle with grated nutmeg.

cocktails.name: Brandy Sangaree
cocktails.description: A sophisticated and historical cocktail that balances the robust warmth of Cognac with the nutty, fortified sweetness of Tawny Port. A touch of rich simple syrup adds body, creating a silky, contemplative drink perfect for slow sipping.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Chill your Nick & Nora glass by placing it in the freezer or filling it with ice water.
2. In a mixing glass, combine the Cognac, Tawny Port, and rich simple syrup.
3. Add 150g of ice to the mixing glass.
4. Stir the mixture gently for about 20-30 seconds until it is well-chilled and properly diluted.
5. Fine strain the liquid into your chilled Nick & Nora glass.
6. Optionally, garnish with a light dusting of freshly grated nutmeg to enhance the aromatic profile.

cocktails.name: Brandy Separator
cocktails.description: A variation of the 'White Russian', this cocktail is close to the 'Sneaky Pete', but smoother. The amount of milk can be varied according to taste.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a rocks glass with ice cubes.
2. Add 15ml of coffee liqueur, 30ml of brandy and 100ml of milk.
3. Stir gently.

cocktails.name: Brave Bull
cocktails.description: A spirit-forward agave spirit cocktail showcasing Tequila Blanco, Kahlua—deep, aromatic, and meant to be savored.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a rocks glass with ice cubes.
2. Pour 50ml of silver tequila and 30ml of Kahlua.
3. Stir a little bit to lightly mix the ingredients.

cocktails.name: BRB
cocktails.description: A spirit-forward whiskey cocktail showcasing Bourbon, Root Beer—deep, aromatic, and meant to be savored.

cocktails.name: Breakfast Martini
cocktails.description: A spirit-forward gin cocktail showcasing Gin, Triple Sec, Orange Marmalade—deep, aromatic, and meant to be savored. Garnished with lemon.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add 50ml of gin, 15ml of triple sec, 15ml of lemon juice and 1 teaspoon of marmalade to a shaker and stir to break up the marmalade.
1. Add ice and shake.
1. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
1. Garnish with grated lemon zest.

cocktails.name: Bronx
cocktails.description: A classic gin cocktail with sweet and dry vermouth brightened by orange juice.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with an orange peel.

cocktails.name: Buck's Fizz
cocktails.description: A long drink of orange juice topped with sparkling wine.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 50ml of orange juice into the glass.
2. Top with 100ml of champagne or dry sparkling wine and stir gently.
3. Garnish with an orange twist.

cocktails.name: Bull Shot
cocktails.description: This is a variation of the Bloody Mary that became a popular cocktail.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Put ice cubes into a highball glass.
2. Add 1 dash of Worcestershire sauce, Tabasco, salt, and pepper.
3. Pour 30ml of vodka, 60ml of beef bouillon and 10ml of lemon juice over the ice.
4. Stir gently and garnish with a celery stalk and a lemon wedge.

cocktails.name: Bullfrog
cocktails.description: A strong and invigorating cocktail, something you'd want to order in a nightclub.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Prepare the Glass: Fill a tall collins or hurricane glass roughly 75% full with ice.
2. Add Spirits: Pour the vodka, gin, rum, and tequila directly over the ice.
3. Add Citrus & Color: Pour in the lemon juice and drizzle the Blue Curaçao over the top. This gives the drink its signature vibrant blue-green "bullfrog" color.
4. Top & Stir: Top the glass with the energy drink. Give it a gentle stir to combine the ingredients without losing too much carbonation.
5. Garnish: Finish with a lemon slice and a cherry on the rim.

cocktails.name: Bumbo
cocktails.description: A spirit-forward rum cocktail showcasing White Rum, Cinnamon, Nutmeg—deep, aromatic, and meant to be savored. Garnished with cinnamon sticks.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour the rum, water and simple syrup into a warm or ice-filled rock glass.
2. Garnish: Finish with a generous grating of fresh nutmeg and a cinnamon stick.

cocktails.name: Bushwacker
cocktails.description: A delicious, creamy long cocktail that is very similar to the Piña Colada. The recipe here is for 3 cocktails. A blender should be big enough to fit at least 1 liter of the mixture.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Combine: Add the rum, coffee liqueur, crème de cacao, cream of coconut, milk, and ice into a blender.
2. Blend: Process on high until the mixture is smooth, frothy, and reaches a milkshake-like consistency (typically 10–25 seconds).
3. Prep the Glass: Optional but traditional: drizzle chocolate syrup in a swirl inside a chilled hurricane glass.
4. Pour and Garnish: Pour the blended mixture into the glass. Top with a sprinkle of freshly grated nutmeg and maraschino cherries.

cocktails.name: Butterfinger
cocktails.description: A Butterfinger cocktail or shot is a dessert-inspired drink designed to mimic the nutty, buttery flavors of the classic candy bar. Most variations rely on a blend of butterscotch and creamy liqueurs.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice.
2. Shake until the outside of the shaker is frosted.
3. Strain into a chilled martini glass or over fresh ice in a rocks glass.

cocktails.name: Butterfinger Shot
cocktails.description: A Butterfinger cocktail or shot is a dessert-inspired drink designed to mimic the nutty, buttery flavors of the classic candy bar. Most variations rely on a blend of butterscotch and creamy liqueurs.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Prepare the Glass: Roll half of the rim of a shot glass in heated chocolate syrup, then roll the same half in crushed Butterfinger candy.
2. Layer the Kahlúa: Pour 15ml of Kahlúa into the shot glass.
3. Add Butterscotch liqueur: Layer 15ml of Butterscotch liqueur on top of the Kahlúa.
3. Layer Baileys: Use a pourer for the Baileys. Place a cocktail spoon with the bowl side up against the side of the glass, and slowly pour 15ml of Baileys over the back of the spoon to layer it on top of the schnapps.
4. Add more crushed Butterfinger candy.

cocktails.name: Buttery Nipple
cocktails.description: A variation of the "Slippery Nipple" cocktail but with butterscotch instead of Sambuca. This one is even sweeter and softer than the original.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour 30ml of butterscotch liqueur into a shooter glass.
2. Carefully pour 15ml of Baileys on top.
3. Optionally, add a dash of grenadine syrup.

cocktails.name: Caipirão
cocktails.description: A bright spirit sour balancing Lime, Sugar, Licor Beirão with fresh citrus and a touch of sweetness for a crisp, refreshing sip.
cocktails.instructions:
Muddle lime wedges and sugar in a rocks glass.
Fill the glass with crushed ice.
Pour Licor Beirão over the ice.
Stir gently.

cocktails.name: Caipirinha
cocktails.description: Brazil's national cocktail of muddled lime, sugar, and cachaça served over ice.
cocktails.instructions:
Muddle lime wedges and sugar in a rocks glass.
Fill the glass with crushed ice.
Pour cachaça over the ice.
Stir gently.

cocktails.name: Caipirissima
cocktails.description: A bright rum sour balancing Lime, Sugar, White Rum with fresh citrus and a touch of sweetness for a crisp, refreshing sip.
cocktails.instructions:
Muddle lime wedges and sugar in a rocks glass.
Fill the glass with crushed ice.
Pour rum over the ice.
Stir gently.

cocktails.name: Caipiroska
cocktails.description: A bright vodka sour balancing Vodka, Lime, Sugar with fresh citrus and a touch of sweetness for a crisp, refreshing sip.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Muddle lime wedges and sugar in a rocks glass.
2. Fill the glass with crushed ice.
3. Pour vodka over the ice.
4. Stir gently.

cocktails.name: California Root Beer
cocktails.description: A fizzy cocktail that mimics the taste of root beer with coffee and vanilla notes.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Shale first 3 ingredients with ice.
2. Strain into an ice-filled glass.
3. Top with soda.
4. Garnish with lime wedge..

cocktails.name: Calypso Coffee
cocktails.description: A rich coffee cocktail with dark rum and Kahlua finished with cream.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a rocks glass with ice.
2. Pour 30ml of dark rum and 30ml of Kahlua.
3. Add 150ml of coffee.
4. Top with 30ml of double cream.
5. Garnish with coffee beans.

cocktails.name: Campari Gin Tonic
cocktails.description: A simple classic cocktail, but with the bitterness of Campari and a hint of sweetness.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass with ice.
2. Add 40ml of gin, 20ml of Campari and 100ml of tonic.
3. Stir gently and garnish with an orange wedge.

cocktails.name: Canary Flip
cocktails.description: A bold combination of wine and egg liqueur.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Combine 60ml of egg liqueur, 60ml of white wine and 20ml of lemon juice in a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Shake well and strain into a big chilled Martini glass.
3. Garnish with lemon zest.

cocktails.name: Canchanchara
cocktails.description: A rustic Cuban mix of honey, lime, and white rum served over ice.
cocktails.instructions:
Combine honey syrup and lime juice in a rocks glass.
Stir to dissolve.
Fill the glass with crushed ice.
Pour white rum over the ice.
Stir briefly.

cocktails.name: Cantaritos
cocktails.description: A refreshing Mexican cocktail traditionally served in a clay pot.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Prepare the clay pot, if using, by soaking it in cold water for 10–15 minutes.
2. Put some salt on the rim of the glass and add ice.
3. Pour 60ml of tequila blanco, 15ml of orange juice, 15ml of lemon juice and 15ml of lime juice into the glass.
4. Top with 60ml of pink grapefruit soda.
5. Garnish with pink grapefruit if desired.

cocktails.name: Cape Cod
cocktails.description: A simple mix of vodka and cranberry juice named after the Massachusetts peninsula.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass with ice.
2. Add 40ml of vodka and 120ml of cranberry juice.
3. Stir well and garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Car Crash
cocktails.description: A sweet and fruity long drink.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Shake the Base: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add amaretto, peach liqueur, orange juice, and sour mix.
2. Strain: Shake well until chilled and strain into a tall Collins glass filled with fresh ice.
3. The "Crash": Slowly pour the grenadine over the back of a spoon. It will sink to the bottom, creating a red "crash" effect.
4. Garnish: Finish with an orange slice and a maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Cardinale
cocktails.description: A dry, bittersweet Negroni variation with gin, Campari, and dry vermouth.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice.
Stir well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Caribbean Treasure
cocktails.description: A tropical liqueur cocktail with Lychee, Coconut Liqueur, Strawberry Liqueur, layered with citrus and sweetness for a lush, beachy vibe. Garnished with strawberry.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Muddle: Place the 3 peeled and pitted lychees into a cocktail shaker and muddle them thoroughly to release their juice and aroma.
2. Combine: Add the coconut liqueur, strawberry liqueur, and pineapple juice into the shaker.
3. Shake: Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake vigorously until the mixture is well-chilled.
4. Strain: Fill a highball glass with fresh ice cubes. Fine strain the mixture from the shaker into the glass to remove lychee pulp.
5. Garnish: Finish the drink with strawberry halves and a fresh mint sprig.

cocktails.name: Caribou Lou
cocktails.description: A spirit-forward rum cocktail showcasing Overproof Rum, Malibu Rum, Pineapple Juice—deep, aromatic, and meant to be savored.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Prepare the Glass: Fill a highball glass or tiki mug with fresh ice.
2. Combine: Pour the 151-proof rum, coconut rum, and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker filled with ice.
3. Shake: Shake vigorously for about 10–15 seconds until well-chilled.
4. Strain: Strain the mixture into the prepared glass.
5. Garnish: Top with a pineapple wedge or maraschino cherry and serve with a straw.

cocktails.name: Carribbean Breeze
cocktails.description: A tropical cocktail with Light Rum, Banana Liqueur and Pineapple Juice, layered with citrus and sweetness for a lush, beachy vibe.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Shakeall ingredients with ice.
2. Strain into an ice-filled glass.
3. Garnish with a grapefruit or pineapple wedge on the rim.

cocktails.name: Casino
cocktails.description: A classic gin sour with maraschino and orange bitters.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice.
2. Shake well.
3. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
4. Garnish with a lemon twist and a maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Champagne Cocktail
cocktails.description: A celebratory sparkling cocktail with a bitters-soaked sugar cube and a splash of cognac.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Soak a sugar cube with bitters and place it in a champagne flute.
2. Add cognac.
3. Top with chilled champagne.
4. Garnish with an orange slice and a maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Champs Elysees
cocktails.description: A bright brandy sour balancing Cognac, Green Chartreuse, Lemon with fresh citrus and a touch of sweetness for a crisp, refreshing sip. Garnished with lemon.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Shake all ingredients with ice.
2. Fine strain into chilled glass.
3. Express lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.

cocktails.name: Charlie Chaplin
cocktails.description: A spirit-forward brandy cocktail showcasing Apricot Brandy, Sloe Gin—deep, aromatic, and meant to be savored. Garnished with lime.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour the sloe gin, apricot brandy, and lime juice into a cocktail shaker filled with ice.
2. Shake vigorously for at least 15–30 seconds to ensure proper dilution and a cold temperature.
3. Strain into a chilled glass.
4. Express the oils from a lime twist over the drink and drop it in.

cocktails.name: Chartreuse Swizzle
cocktails.description: A tropical swizzle of green chartreuse, pineapple, lime, and falernum, finished with mint and nutmeg.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a tiki mug filled with crushed ice.
Swizzle until the mug frosts.
Top with more crushed ice.
Garnish with a mint sprig and grated nutmeg.

cocktails.name: Cherry Alexander
cocktails.description: A rich, creamy vodka drink featuring Vodka Vanilla, Cherry Heering, Creme de Cacao White—dessert-like, smooth, and indulgent. Garnished with maraschino cherry.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Combine ingredients: Add the vodka (or gin), crème de cacao, cherry liqueur, and cream into a cocktail shaker filled with ice.
2. Shake: Shake vigorously for approximately 10–15 seconds until the outside of the shaker feels very cold.
3. Strain: Double-strain into the chilled glass.
4. Garnish: Top with a single cherry. Grate a small amount of nutmeg over the surface to enhance the aroma.

cocktails.name: Cherry Hooker
cocktails.description: A spirit-forward brandy cocktail showcasing Cherry Brandy, Orange Juice—deep, aromatic, and meant to be savored. Garnished with lime.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add ice to a Collins glass
2. Add a dash of grenadine
3. Pour in orange juice
4. Float cherry brandy on top
5. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry

cocktails.name: Chilcano de Pisco
cocktails.description: A long, sparkling brandy drink built for easy sipping, pairing Pisco, Angostura Bitters, Ginger Ale with bubbly mixers over ice. Garnished with lime.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball or Collins glass with fresh ice cubes.
2. Pour the pisco and lime juice over the ice.
3. Fill the glass with chilled ginger ale.
4. Add 2 dashes of bitters on top.
5. Gently stir and garnish with a lime wheel or wedge.

cocktails.name: Chocolate Espresso Martini
cocktails.description: A spirit-forward vodka cocktail showcasing Vodka, Coffee Liqueur, Espresso—deep, aromatic, and meant to be savored. Garnished with chocolate syrup.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Chill the glass: Place your martini or coupe glass in the freezer beforehand.
2. Combine: Add all liquid ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with plenty of ice.
3. Shake Hard: Shake vigorously for at least 15–20 seconds. This is essential to create the signature frothy top.
4. Strain: Double-strain into your chilled glass to ensure a smooth texture without ice chips. 

Presentation and Garnishes
To elevate the visual appeal, you can:
• Rim the glass: Dip the rim in chocolate syrup, then into cocoa powder or chocolate shavings.
• Drizzle: Spiral chocolate syrup inside the glass before pouring the drink.
• Top: Garnish with the traditional three coffee beans, a dusting of cocoa powder, or fine chocolate curls.

cocktails.name: Chocolate Negroni
cocktails.description: A sophisticated and decadent twist on the classic Negroni. This version balances the botanical depth of gin and the bittersweet complexity of Punt e Mes and Strucchi Bitter with smooth notes of white cacao and aromatic chocolate bitters.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with plenty of ice.
2. Add the Gin, Punt e Mes, Strucchi Bitter, and Creme de Cacao White to the glass.
3. Add 3 dashes of Chocolate Bitters.
4. Stir gently with a bar spoon for about 20-30 seconds until the drink is well-chilled.
5. Strain the mixture into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice.
6. Express the oils from an orange zest over the drink and drop it in as a garnish.

cocktails.name: Christmas Velvet Alexander
cocktails.description: A luxurious festive delight that pairs the velvety texture of egg liqueur with the botanical bite of gin and the dry elegance of Fino sherry. Perfectly balanced, creamy, and topped with aromatic nutmeg, it is the ultimate holiday dessert cocktail.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Chill your coupe glass in the freezer or by filling it with ice water.
2. Add the egg liqueur, gin, and Fino sherry into a cocktail shaker filled with plenty of ice.
3. Shake vigorously for about 10-15 seconds until the mixture is well-chilled and develops a frothy consistency.
4. Double strain the liquid through a fine-mesh strainer into the chilled coupe glass to ensure a smooth texture.
5. Finish by grating fresh nutmeg over the top for a festive aroma.

cocktails.name: Clover Club
cocktails.description: A pre-Prohibition gin sour colored with raspberry syrup and bound with egg white.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a shaker without ice and dry shake.
Add ice and shake again.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Cold Blooded
cocktails.description: A sophisticated herbal twist on a fruit sour, blending the rich orange notes of Grand Marnier with tart cranberry and fresh lemon. Infused with aromatic rosemary, this cocktail offers a crisp, vibrant, and perfectly balanced flavor profile that is both refreshing and complex.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Place the first rosemary sprig and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker and muddle gently to release the aromatic oils.
2. Add the Grand Marnier, cranberry juice, and rich simple syrup to the shaker.
3. Fill the shaker with ice and shake vigorously for about 10-15 seconds until well-chilled.
4. Double strain the mixture into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice to remove any rosemary bits.
5. Garnish with the remaining fresh sprig of rosemary and serve immediately.

cocktails.name: Contessa
cocktails.description: A bold, spirit-forward gin drink built around Gin, Dry Vermouth, Aperol—bitter-leaning, aromatic, and best served well chilled. Garnished with orange.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Combine Ingredients: Pour the gin, Aperol, and dry vermouth into a mixing glass filled with ice.
2. Stir: Stir well for about 20–30 seconds until the mixture is thoroughly chilled and properly diluted.
3. Strain:
• For a "Up" version: Strain into a chilled coupe or cocktail glass.
• For a "On the Rocks" version: Strain into a rocks glass (Old Fashioned glass) over a large, fresh ice cube.
4. Garnish: Express the oils from an orange peel over the glass or add an orange wheel to the drink.

cocktails.name: Copenhagen 1939
cocktails.description: A bright gin sour balancing Gin, Red Vermouth, Cherry Liqueur with fresh citrus and a touch of sweetness for a crisp, refreshing sip.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Combine: Add the gin, cherry liqueur, sweet vermouth, lemon juice, simple syrup, and bitters into a cocktail shaker filled with ice.
2. Shake: Shake the mixture vigorously until well-chilled.
3. Strain: Double-strain the liquid into a chilled coupe or cocktail glass.
4. Garnish: Express the oils of a lemon twist over the drink and drop it in.

cocktails.name: Cornwall Negroni
cocktails.description: A sophisticated, gin-forward riff on the classic Negroni. This version balances the herbal complexity of Punt e Mes and Strucchi Bitter with a bright touch of orange, resulting in a perfectly structured, bittersweet, and aromatic aperitivo.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a mixing glass with plenty of ice.
2. Add the gin, Punt e Mes, Strucchi Bitter, and red vermouth into the glass.
3. Add a dash of orange bitters.
4. Stir the mixture gently but thoroughly for about 20-30 seconds until well-chilled and properly diluted.
5. Strain the liquid into a chilled cocktail glass.
6. Express the oils from an orange zest over the drink and garnish.

cocktails.name: Corona Sunrise
cocktails.description: A vibrant and refreshing beer cocktail that puts a tropical twist on the classic Tequila Sunrise. It perfectly blends the crispness of Corona with tequila, sweet orange juice, and a splash of grenadine for a beautiful layered look.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a pub glass with ice cubes.
2. Pour in the tequila and orange juice.
3. Top the glass with Corona beer, leaving a little space at the top.
4. Slowly pour the grenadine over the back of a spoon so it settles at the bottom to create the sunrise effect.
5. Squeeze a fresh lime wedge into the drink and drop it in as a garnish.
6. Serve immediately and enjoy.

cocktails.name: Corpse Reviver
cocktails.description: A bold, spirit-forward brandy drink built around Cognac, Calvados, Red Vermouth—bitter-leaning, aromatic, and best served well chilled.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. 
2. Garnish with an orange wedge.

cocktails.name: Corpse Reviver #2
cocktails.description: A balanced mix of gin, citrus, and aromatics traditionally taken as a morning pick-me-up.
cocktails.instructions:
Rinse a chilled cocktail glass with absinthe and discard the excess.
Shake gin, Cointreau, Lillet Blanc, and lemon juice with ice.
Strain into the prepared glass.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Cosmopolitan
cocktails.description: A citrusy vodka cocktail with cranberry and orange notes.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with an orange twist.

cocktails.name: Creamsicle
cocktails.description: A luscious and velvety cocktail that perfectly captures the nostalgic flavor of an orange creamsicle. It balances the bright, citrusy notes of lemon vodka and Cointreau with the rich, smooth texture of fresh cream.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Chill your cocktail glass by placing it in the freezer or filling it with ice.
2. Add Vodka Citron, Cointreau, cream, and simple syrup (if desired) into a cocktail shaker.
3. Fill the shaker with ice and shake vigorously for about 15 seconds until well-chilled.
4. Strain the mixture into the chilled cocktail glass.
5. Garnish with a fresh orange slice or zest.

cocktails.name: Creme Anglaise
cocktails.description: A rich, creamy vodka drink featuring Vodka, Egg Liqueur, Cream—dessert-like, smooth, and indulgent. Garnished with chocolate.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Prepare Glass: Pre-chill a cocktail glass or a Nick & Nora glass.
2. Combine: Add the vanilla vodka, Advocaat, and cream into a cocktail shaker filled with ice.
3. Shake: Shake vigorously for about 10–15 seconds until the outside of the shaker feels very cold.
4. Strain: Fine strain the mixture into your chilled glass to ensure a perfectly smooth, silky texture.
5. Garnish: Dust the top lightly with chocolate powder or cocoa before serving.

cocktails.name: Crimson King
cocktails.description: A sophisticated, spirit-forward whiskey cocktail that balances the spicy bite of Rye with the complex bitterness of Strucchi and the herbal depth of Punt e Mes. Hints of cherry and coffee add a mysterious, dark richness to this bold drink.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Chill your rocks glass by filling it with ice or placing it in the freezer.
2. Combine the Rye Whisky, Strucchi Bitter, Punt e Mes, Cherry Heering, and Crème de Café in a mixing glass.
3. Fill the mixing glass with plenty of ice.
4. Stir gently but thoroughly for about 20-30 seconds to chill and achieve the proper dilution.
5. Strain the mixture into the chilled rocks glass over a large ice cube or fresh ice.
6. Garnish with a Maraschino cherry and serve.

cocktails.name: Cuba Libre
cocktails.description: A simple mix of rum, cola, and lime for a refreshing long drink.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a highball glass with ice.
Pour rum and lime juice over the ice.
Top with cola and stir gently.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Culto A La Vida
cocktails.description: A bright rum sour balancing White Rum, Sugar, Lime with fresh citrus and a touch of sweetness for a crisp, refreshing sip. Garnished with lime juice.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Dissolve the Sugar: In a long drink glass (highball or Collins glass), combine the lime juice and the sugar.
2. Stir until the sugar is fully dissolved.
3. Add Ice: Fill the glass with fresh ice cubes.
4. Mix in Liquids: Pour in the cranberry juice followed by the dark rum.
5. Stir and Serve: Stir the mixture well to combine the flavors. Garnish with a lime wedge on the rim and serve immediately.

cocktails.name: Daiquiri
cocktails.description: A classic rum sour balancing lime and sugar.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a lime slice.

cocktails.name: Damn the Bloody Weather
cocktails.description: A tropical gin cocktail with Gin, Orange Curaçao, Red Vermouth, layered with citrus and sweetness for a lush, beachy vibe. Garnished with blood orange.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Shake all ingredients with ice.
2. Strain into a chilled glass.
3. Garnish with a blood orange slice.

cocktails.name: Dan Sabo's Whiskey Sour
cocktails.description: A rich, creamy whiskey drink featuring Rye Whisky, Lemon, Egg White—dessert-like, smooth, and indulgent. Garnished with maraschino cherry.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Dry Shake: Add the whiskey, orange juice, simple syrup, lemon juice, and egg white into a cocktail shaker. Shake vigorously without ice to emulsify the egg white and create foam.
2. Wet Shake: Add plenty of ice to the shaker and shake again until the exterior is very cold to the touch.
3. Strain: Double-strain the mixture through a fine-mesh sieve into a chilled coupe or rocks glass.
4. Finish: Express the oils of a lemon peel over the surface of the drink by twisting it, then garnish with the peel and a cherry.

cocktails.name: Dandy
cocktails.description: A bold, spirit-forward whiskey drink built around Whisky, Dubonnet, Cointreau—bitter-leaning, aromatic, and best served well chilled. Garnished with orange.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add whiskey, Dubonnet, bitters, and Cointreau into a mixing glass filled with ice.
2. Stir well until thoroughly chilled (do not shake for this version to maintain clarity).
3. Strain into a chilled cocktail or coupe glass.
4. Express both the lemon and orange peels over the drink and drop them in.

cocktails.name: Dark 'n Stormy
cocktails.description: Spicy ginger beer topped with dark rum for a stormy refresher.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass with ice.
2. Pour dark rum and lime juice over the ice.
3. Top with ginger beer.
4. Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Death & Taxes
cocktails.description: A complex whiskey cocktail where Scotch Whiskey, Gin, Punt e Mes meets citrus—bittersweet, zesty, and nicely structured. Garnished with lemon.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add all ingredients into a mixing glass filled with ice.
2. Stir for approximately 20–30 seconds until the drink is well-chilled and properly diluted.
3. Strain into a pre-chilled coupe or Nick & Nora glass.
4. Express the oils from a lemon twist over the surface of the drink and drop it in.

cocktails.name: Death In The Afternoon
cocktails.description: A spirit-forward wine cocktail showcasing Absinthe, Sparkling Wine—deep, aromatic, and meant to be savored.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour the absinthe (and simple syrup, if using) into a chilled Champagne flute or coupe glass.
2. Slowly top with the chilled Champagne to trigger the clouding effect.
3. Garnish with a lemon twist or rose petal.

cocktails.name: Delta Sunset
cocktails.description: Delta Sunset is a glorious, quite strong cocktail. Stirred with 30ml orange liqueur Cointreau and 30ml orange liqueur Continental with 30ml lemon juice, as well as 150gr and best served with farinaceous starchy dishes.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Place ice into mixing glass then add ingredients to mixing glass and stir well until mixed. 
2. Fine strain into glass and served in a martini glass cold.

cocktails.name: Derby Popular
cocktails.description: A bold, spirit-forward whiskey drink built around Bourbon, Benedictine, Angostura Bitters—bitter-leaning, aromatic, and best served well chilled. Garnished with lemon.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Stir with ice until chilled.
2. Pour into a Nick & Nora glass. 
3. Garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Desert Island
cocktails.description: A long, sparkling liqueur drink built for easy sipping, pairing Coconut Liqueur, Cola with bubbly mixers over ice. Garnished with lime.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes.
2. Pour in the coconut liqueur.
3. Top with cola and stir gently to combine.
4. Garnish with both a lemon wheel and a lime wheel.

cocktails.name: Devil's Margarita
cocktails.description: A bright agave spirit sour balancing Tequila Blanco, Red Wine with fresh citrus and a touch of sweetness for a crisp, refreshing sip. Garnished with lime.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Shake first 3 ingredients with ice and fine-strain into a chilled glass. 
2. Carefully float the wine.

cocktails.name: Dirty Banana
cocktails.description: A rich, creamy rum drink featuring White Rum, Coffee Liqueur, Banana Liqueur—dessert-like, smooth, and indulgent. Garnished with banana.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Blend all ingredients with crushed ice.
2. Pour into a chilled glass.
3. Garnish with a banana slice on the rim

cocktails.name: Dirty Girl Scout
cocktails.description: A sweet and strong cocktail.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Fill a shaker with ice cubes.
2. Pour 30ml of vodka, 30ml of coffee liqueur, 30ml of Baileys and 30ml of creme de menthe white.
3. Shake and strain into a glass. 
May be served as 3 shots.

cocktails.name: Dirty Shyrly
cocktails.description: A long, sparkling vodka drink built for easy sipping, pairing Vodka, Grenadine, Lime with bubbly mixers over ice. Garnished with maraschino cherry.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Pour in 2 oz of vodka and 1 oz of grenadine in a highball or Collins glass.
2. Fill the remainder of the glass with lemon-lime soda.
3. Stir gently with a bar spoon.
4. Garnish with a maraschino cherry or a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Don's Special Daiquiri
cocktails.description: A tiki-style daiquiri with grapefruit and honey notes.
cocktails.instructions:
1. Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
2. Shake well.
3. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
4. Garnish with a lime slice.

cocktails.name: Doralto
